about_the_game:
Neko Café is in development so media on this store page may not reflect current state of game!! To keep up to date why not jump in our Discord, and hey don't forget to wishlist while you're here!

Join Flapjack and Kickflip on their journey to create the perfect Café! Design the menu and craft delicious sandwiches, and customise every detail of your space.
As your café thrives unlock new items, face fresh challenges, and expand your business!
Hire and manage a team, nurture their skills, and watch them reach their full purrtential!

Befriend the Coolest Kitties of New Neko City!

Keep an ear out for Rumors dropped by gossiping catstomers and you might learn how to attract some purrticularly cool cats, who are sure to help build your cafés reputation and maybe even unlock some new styles and decor!

And who knows what kind of mysteries and secrets you might uncover in a city filled with this much curiosity…

Create a café to attract that super ellusive eccentric cat! Create a café to suit the season! Create a café to suit your own purrsonal creative flair! From the floors and walls to the furniture and decor, everything can be customised!

And there is a lot to customise, with over 200 unique items to be discovered!

Café getting a little TOO popular? Thing’s getting too cosy and not enough tables to deal with the ever growing line of cats?

Maybe it’s time to hit up Claw Hammer Construction to upgrade the your kitchen and café floor space, unlock upgrades and features, and purchase new materials to decorate with!

Discover over 60 unique ingredients, and find the best combinations to maximise flavour AND profit, while creating your very own menus!

Master ingredients, and unlock their full potential!

Craft the perfect purrsonalised sandwiches to make friendships for life!

Hire your very own staff, and train them to greatness.. or your very specific need!

Want a chef that will make every last sandwich complete perfection, or that can smash out five plates in the same time? A waiter with the purrfect personality to rake in the tips, or light on their paws and can bus a table in seconds?

Want your front of house in ties and cooks in chefs hats and whites? Set uniforms, or style each cat uniquely!

But also be sure to also manage their needs and expectations! The best workers are happy energetic workers, push them too far and they will quit!

Don’t forget to pay your rent and bills or you might have to take out loans (boo!) to keep the landlord at bay!

Keep track of everything using calendars and graphs and stuff, its all very boring and fun!

Potentially go bankrupt due to being bad at capitalism (see next section)!

Tailor the game to what YOU want! Want the vanilla business management mixed with collecting and decoration? Awesome! Wanna turn off all the rent and bills and just collect stuff and make a cool space? We got you too!

Neko Café wants to be as open to expression and creativity as possible, and that means making our game as accessible for you as possible.

Overview

  • Discover and befriend the Catizens of New Neko City!

  • Unlock over 60 sandwich ingredients.

  • Find over 200 unique items.

  • Purrsonalise everything from the floors to uniforms!

  • Hire, train, and promote your staff to greatness.

  • Play dress ups and boop noses!

  • Accessibility options incl fully remappable controls.

name: Neko Cafe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit processor and Operating System
  • Processor: 2-3GHz
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 ti 4GB / R9 380 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-Bit processor and Operating System
  • Processor: 2-3GHZ
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 4GB / RX 580 8GB

short_description: Befriend and charm the Catizens of New Neko City! Discover over 60 sandwich ingredients and more than 200 items for your Café! Purrsonalise every aspect, from furniture and décor to uniforms and outfits! Welcome to New Neko City - let’s get cooking!
